item.description:
Dear Fellow Course Students and Friends,

You are invited to attend the 3rd annual ACIM CT picnic.  We will be coming together again this year for fun and relaxation at beautiful Wickham Park, in Manchester, CT.  Hopefully, the weather will cooperate.  If the weather is not good enough, we will have a potluck at Jeff and Theresa's house.**

Date: Sunday June 26th

Place: Wickham Park, 1329 Middle Tpke W, Manchester, CT,  (860) 528-0856

            There is a $5 entrance fee per vehicle

Time: Feel free to come by any time after 11:00 AM.  We will plan to eat around 1:00 or 2:00.  Come early if you want to enjoy the park, play Bocce Ball, try out the disc golf course, or visit some of the lovely formal gardens.

Details:  We will have picnic tables in the Hickory Grove II area, on the left side of the road.  It is on the left as you approach the Cabin. Ask for a map when you get to the park.

Bring a folding chair, if you have one.  Also, to reduce waste, please bring your own plates, utensils, and cups.  We'll have some extras for those who forget.

Potluck: Please bring something to share.  There is a small charcoal grill so that is an option.   

Let us know what you will be bringing via e-mail or a phone call to the number listed below so that we can coordinate food. 

We look forward to connecting with old friends and meeting new friends.  Please let all your Course friends know about the picnic. 
 

Many Blessings,

Theresa and the Glastonbury ACIM Study Group

 

**Bad Weather Location: Jeff and Theresa Covington, 460 Foote Rd., South Glastonbury, (860) 338-3922.
item.how_to_find_us: See below. We will have a large sign with balloons.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: 2011 CT ACIM Picnic
